Announcements.Name: Coronavirus instructions
Announcements.Information: The recommendation of distance teaching by The Ministry of Education and Culture ended on January 31, 2022. In Metropolia, from February 14, 2022, onwards, the learning objectives determine the teaching method. The teaching carried out on the campuses will increase. The business-related continuous learning can be carried out without restrictions on the number of participants. Corona passport is no longer mandatory in the trainings. Common health safety guidelines are followed.
